languages.text: "И эта убежденность превратила вас в чудовище, ведущее доверенный {mf|ему|ей} надел в пропасть". {n}Префект прожигает вас взглядом.{/n} "Тяжесть ваших прегрешений достаточно велика, чтобы низложить весь ваш род. Не сопротивляйтесь закону, фон Валанциус — это лишь усугубит ваше положение".

"And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."
languages.original_text: "И эта убежденность превратила вас в чудовище, ведущее доверенный {mf|ему|ей} надел в пропасть". {n}Префект прожигает вас взглядом.{/n} "Тяжесть ваших прегрешений достаточно велика, чтобы низложить весь ваш род. Не сопротивляйтесь закону, фон Валанциус — это лишь усугубит ваше положение".

traits.locale_text: "And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that leads the territory in {mf|his|her} charge toward the abyss." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so would only serve to make your situation worse."

"And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that leads the territory in {mf|his|her} charge toward the abyss." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so would only serve to make your situation worse."

"And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole territory down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

"And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole territory down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

"And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

"And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

languages.text: "Und genau diese Überzeugung hat Euch in ein Monster verwandelt, das sich dem Abyss zugewandt hat und das ganze Reich mit sich in die Tiefe reißen will." {n}Die Augen der Präfektin scheinen dich zu durchbohren.{/n} "Die Schwere Eurer Verbrechen reicht aus, um Eure ganze Dynastie auszulöschen. Stellt Euch nicht gegen das Gesetz, von Valancius ... das macht Eure Situation nur noch schlimmer."
languages.original_text: "And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

traits.locale_text: "Und genau diese Überzeugung hat Euch in ein Monster verwandelt, das sich dem Abyss zugewandt hat und das ganze Reich mit sich in die Tiefe reißen will." {n}Die Augen der Präfektin scheinen dich zu durchbohren.{/n} "Die Schwere Eurer Verbrechen reicht aus, um Eure ganze Dynastie auszulöschen. Stellt Euch nicht gegen das Gesetz, von Valancius ... das macht Eure Situation nur noch schlimmer."

languages.text: « C'est précisément cette conviction qui a fait de vous un monstre qui se précipite vers l'abîme tout en entraînant le royaume entier avec lui, {n}rétorque-t-elle en vous transperçant de son regard brûlant.{/n} La gravité de vos crimes suffirait à destituer votre dynastie entière. Ne vous opposez pas à la loi, von Valancius. Vous ne feriez qu'aggraver votre cas. »
languages.original_text: "And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

traits.locale_text: « C'est précisément cette conviction qui a fait de vous un monstre qui se précipite vers l'abîme tout en entraînant le royaume entier avec lui, {n}rétorque-t-elle en vous transperçant de son regard brûlant.{/n} La gravité de vos crimes suffirait à destituer votre dynastie entière. Ne vous opposez pas à la loi, von Valancius. Vous ne feriez qu'aggraver votre cas. »

languages.text: “而正是由于这种思想，你已经堕落成了怪物，拖着你的王朝冲向黑暗的深渊。”{n}行政官的目光仿佛要将你刺穿。{/n}“你的罪行极其严重，足以颠覆整个王朝。不要再反抗法律了，冯·瓦兰修斯，这么做只会让你的处境更加糟糕。”
languages.original_text: "And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

traits.locale_text: “而正是由于这种思想，你已经堕落成了怪物，拖着你的王朝冲向黑暗的深渊。”{n}行政官的目光仿佛要将你刺穿。{/n}“你的罪行极其严重，足以颠覆整个王朝。不要再反抗法律了，冯·瓦兰修斯，这么做只会让你的处境更加糟糕。”

languages.text: «Es esa misma creencia la que le ha convertido en un monstruo que amenaza con arrastrar todos sus dominios consigo al abismo». {n}Los ojos de la prefecta parecen querer perforarte.{/n} «La gravedad de sus crímenes es suficiente para derrocar a la dinastía entera. No se oponga a la ley, von Valancius. Solo empeoraría la situación».
languages.original_text: "And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

traits.locale_text: «Es esa misma creencia la que le ha convertido en un monstruo que amenaza con arrastrar todos sus dominios consigo al abismo». {n}Los ojos de la prefecta parecen querer perforarte.{/n} «La gravedad de sus crímenes es suficiente para derrocar a la dinastía entera. No se oponga a la ley, von Valancius. Solo empeoraría la situación».

languages.text: 「その信念こそが、あなたを奈落の底を突き進む怪物へと変え、帝国全体をも引きずり込もうとしているのです」{n}総監の目は、あなたを焼き尽くすかのようである。{/n}「あなたの罪の重さは、あなたの王朝そのものを権力の座から追放するに十分です。フォン・ヴァランシウス、法に背いてはなりません。さもなくば、あなたの立場はさらに悪化するだけです」
languages.original_text: "And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

traits.locale_text: 「その信念こそが、あなたを奈落の底を突き進む怪物へと変え、帝国全体をも引きずり込もうとしているのです」{n}総監の目は、あなたを焼き尽くすかのようである。{/n}「あなたの罪の重さは、あなたの王朝そのものを権力の座から追放するに十分です。フォン・ヴァランシウス、法に背いてはなりません。さもなくば、あなたの立場はさらに悪化するだけです」

languages.text: "İşte bu kanaatiniz yüzünden dipsizliğe doğru koşup tüm diyarı da beraberinizde sürüklemeyi amaçlayan bir canavara dönüştünüz." {n}Prefektin gözleri, âdeta göğsünü delip geçiyor.{/n} "Suçlarınızın yükü, tüm hanedanlığınızı devirmeye yeter. Kanuna karşı gelmeyin. Aksi bir çaba, durumunuzu daha da kötüleştirmekten öteye gitmeyecektir."
languages.original_text: "And it is this conviction that has turned you into a monster that, in its charge toward the abyss, aims to drag the whole realm down with it." {n}The prefect's eyes seem to burn right through you.{/n} "The gravity of your crimes is enough to depose your entire dynasty. Do not oppose the law, von Valancius — doing so will only serve to make your situation worse."

traits.locale_text: "İşte bu kanaatiniz yüzünden dipsizliğe doğru koşup tüm diyarı da beraberinizde sürüklemeyi amaçlayan bir canavara dönüştünüz." {n}Prefektin gözleri âdeta göğsünü delip geçiyor.{/n} "Suçlarınızın yükü, tüm hanedanlığınızı devirmeye yeter. Kanuna karşı gelmeyin von Valancius. Aksi bir çaba, durumunuzu daha da kötüleştirmekten öteye gitmeyecektir."
